We experienced our first fall of snow in New York City yesterday and soon after, the rain made an appearance. I'm one of those people who see the beauty in storms. I fall for Autumn, I live for the rain and I'm in lust with the snow. To me, New York City is a poem that I'll never get tired of reading. #sonyalpha #agameoftones #moodygrams
Winter is coming. Grateful to my wife @Samantha.King.Holmes for always going out into these storms with me to capture the city in photos. This is from sometime last winter.
It's finally snowing in #NYC, so of course my wife @Samantha.King.Holmes and I ventured out to capture the snowfall! #sonyalpha

" we hope this reaches you in time " is the #1 selling poetry book at Barnes & Noble for the second day straight, it's snowing/raining right now and there's plenty coffee in our home. TODAY WAS A GOOD DAY! #coffeetime
maybe this will help someone...I'll always be here for you.
she daydreamed through the chaotic sounds of the city. #sonyalpha

and to my wife @Samantha.King.Holmes, thank you for standing by my side when I had nothing. Thank you for listening to my crazy dreams. Thank you for believing in me even when I had nothing to my name. Thank you for your devotion and loyalty. You continue to be the best thing to ever happen to me and with each day that passes, I find myself falling more in love with everything you are. I love you for your mind and your soul. I love you for your devotion and honesty. I love you for being brave enough to allow me into your heart and your life and I will continue to honor our bond, our friendship and our vows. In a world where people drain each other, hurt each other, down and doubt each other. I will continue to lift you up, to support you, to encourage you and to remain true to what we've created as friends and as a couple. I am filled with gratitude for this woman and that appreciation continues to grow tremendously through the years. #seemyparis #sinmantha

A man who loves himself is capable of appreciating the love and effort from others. I can say from personal experience that loving myself made it even more possible for me to truly love my wife. Yes, I'm imperfect, yes, I know what it means to be broken and yes, I know what it means to be betrayed but that in no way is a good enough excuse to hurt the woman who has invested her energy into me. I honest and loyal to my partner because I respect myself. It all begins with self. Stop blaming yourself for someones inability to care for you properly. It's not your fault, nor should you feel like you have to be with someone who hurts you. You can't force love in spaces where it'll never exist. You owe it to yourself to be with someone capable of loving you. You owe it to yourself to be with someone capable of matching your effort. Maybe this will help open someones eyes, maybe this will help encourage you to move forward with your life. Self love is a powerful thing. Self love can help others appreciate the love they've been given and self love can also help someone move on from a toxic relationship. Self love breeds the courage to reciprocate love. Self love can also help a person build the courage needed to move on. I'm encouraging you to really look at yourself as well as the person you're with and ask yourself....is this really love, are you truly happy?

I never mind the rain. #sonyalpha

Last year, my wife @Samantha.King.Holmes and I decided to go out towards the end of the parade and literally missed the entire thing. This year we stayed in and literally watched it unfold on TV in our living room and also outside of our window...LITERALLY. I captured a lot of shots, some footage and made some new holiday memories. So grateful for my wife and so grateful to everyone reading these words. Almost to the end of this particular chapter as a writer and I'm happy to have been able to share my expression and my art with you. So excited to share the last of my new releases next year. #sonyalpha

explore your city, your country and the world as much and as often as you can. there's so much more to life than wasting time obsessing over someone who was careless with your heart. go out and live your life. create a legacy, cultivate moments and memories. love yourself more and do more of what makes you happy. the time is now.
Harry Poppins. #sonyalpha

there's a calm in our home, so much peace in our home. so happy we decided to focus on ourselves as individuals and our marriage this past year. this might be the easiest holiday both physical and mentally that we've experienced in a very long time. word to the wise, don't forget to put yourself first this holiday season while also investing your energy into people who bring out the best in you. self care is important and your peace of mind is vital. #minimalism #design
stop chasing people. chase peace instead. #leicacamera #coffeelover

shooting in the rain earlier today. I uploaded some of the footage I captured on this shoot in my instagram story, watch it there whenever you get a moment. #sonyalpha #photography

I think there’s this part of you that remains hidden. There’s a side of you that most people rarely see. You’ve buried that part of you deep like roots beneath trees, undiscovered by those who were never willing to search for you. There’s way too much depth in your soul and those too lazy to explore your extra layers have all come up short and you willingly allow it, you don’t bother to tell them that there’s more because you know that not everyone deserves all of which you have to offer. You’ve hidden so much because you’re tired of the betrayal that follows behind those who don’t deserve passage upon your hearts bridge. So much of you left to be discovered by someone who doesn’t have to be told where to go. Someone who knows what to do and how to treat you without hurting you in the process. I think there’s this part of you that will mean the world to the right person but until then, you will always mean the world to yourself and there is nothing wrong with protecting your light from those who will only represent darkness. (She Just Wants to Forget: link in bio)
Lazy Sunday. Just tea and bed peace with my wife. #teatime
